A4001: What was the first or given name(s) of the deceased?
A4002: What was her/his marital status?
A4003: Did s/he ever attend school?
A4004: What is the highest level of school she/he attended: primary, secondary, or higher?
A4005: What is the highest GRADE/YEAR s/he completed (at that level)?
A4006: Was s/he able to read and write?
A4007: What was her/his economic activity status in the year prior to death?
A4007_1: What was her/his occupation, that is, what kind of work did s/he mainly do?
A4008: Did (NAME) drink alcohol?
A4009a: Did s/he use tobacco?
A4010: What kind of tobacco did s/he use?
A4011: How many cigarettes did s/he smoke daily?
A4012: How many times did (s)he use tobacco products each day?
A4013_Units: For how long was (s)he ill before death?
A4014: Did (s)he die suddenly?
A4051: During the illness that led to death, did (NAME) have a fever?
A4052_Units: How long did the fever last?
A4053: Did the fever continue until death?
A4054: How severe was the fever?
A4055: What was the pattern of the fever?
A4056: Did the deceased have night sweats?
A4057: Did s/he drink a lot more water than usual?
A4058: During the illness that led to death, did (NAME) have more frequent loose or liquid stools than usual?
A4059_Units: How long did the frequent loose or liquid stools last?
A4060: At any time during the fatal illness was there blood in the liquid stools?
A4061: Was there blood in the stools up until death?
A4062: During the illness that led to death, did the deceased vomit?
A4063: Did s/he vomit in the week preceding death?
A4064_Units: How long before death did she vomit?
A4064_1: Was there blood in the vomit?
A4065: Was the vomit black?
A4066: Did s/he have any belly (abdominal) problems?
A4067: Did s/he have belly (abdominal) pain?
A4068: Was the belly (abdominal) pain severe?
A4069_Units: For how long did s/he have belly (abdominal) pain?
A4070: Was the pain in the upper or lower belly (abdomen)?
A4071: Did s/he have a more than usually protruding belly (abdomen)?
A4072_Units: For how long before death did s/he have a more than usually protruding belly (abdomen)?
A4073: How rapidly did s/he develop the protruding abdomen?
A4074: Did s/he have a mass in the abdomen?
A4075_Units: For how long did s/he have a mass in the belly (abdomen)?
A4076: During the illness that led to death, did the deceased have a cough?
A4077_Units: For how long did s/he have a cough?
"A4078: Was the cough productive, with sputum?
"A4079: Was the cough very severe?
"A4080: Did s/he cough up blood?
"A4081: During the illness that led to death, did (NAME) have difficulty breathing?
A4082_Units: For how long did the difficulty breathing last?
A4083: Was the difficulty breathing continuous or on and off?
A4084: During the illness that led to death, did (NAME) have fast breathing?
A4085_Units: How long did the fast breathing last?
A4086: During the illness that led to death, did the s/he have breathlessness?
A4087_Units: How long did s/he have breathlessness?
A4088: Was s/he unable to carry out daily routines due to breathlessness?
A4089: Was she breathless while lying flat?
A4090: During the illness that led to death did (s)he have wheezing?
A4091: Did s/he have chest pain?
A4092: Was the chest pain severe?
A4093: How many days before death did s/he have chest pain?
A4094_Units: How long did the chest pain last?
A4095: Did (NAME) have a severe headache?
A4096: Did (NAME) have a stiff neck during the illness that led to death?
A4097_Units: How long before death did s/he have a stiff neck?
A4098: Did (NAME) have a painful neck during the illness that led to death?
A4099_Units: How long before death did s/he have a painful neck?
A4100: Did s/he have mental confusion?
A4101_Units: How long did s/he have mental confusion?
A4102: Was (NAME) unconscious during the illness that led to death?
A4103: Was s/he unconsciousness for more than 24 hours before death?
A4104: Did the unconsciousness start suddenly, quickly (at most within a single day)?
A4105: Did the unconsciousness continue until death?
A4106: During the illness that led to death, did (NAME) have convulsions?
A4107: For how many minutes did the convulsions last?
A4108: Did s/he become unconscious immediately after the convulsion?
A4109: Did the deceased have any urine problems?
A4110: During the fatal illness, did s/he ever pass blood in the urine?
A4111: Did s/he stop urinating?
A4112: During s/he go to urinate more often than usual?
A4113: Did she have sores or ulcers anywhere on the body?
A4114: Did the sores or ulcers have pus?
A4115: Did s/he have an ulcer (pit) on the foot?
A4116: Did the ulcer on the foot ooze pus?
A4117_Units: How long did the ulcer on the foot ooze pus?
A4118: During the illness that led to death, did (NAME) have any skin rash?
A4119: Where was the rash?
A4120: Where did the rash start?
A4121: How many days did the rash last?
A4122: Did s/he have a measles rash (use local term)?
A4123: Did s/he ever have shingles or herpes zoster?
A4124: Did s/he have noticeable weight loss? [hint: limbs (legs, arms) become very thin]
A4125: Was s/he severely thin or wasted?
A4126: During the illness that led to death, did (NAME) have swollen legs or feet?
A4127_Units: How long did the swelling last?
A4128: Did s/he have both feet swollen?
A4129: Did s/he have puffiness of the face?
A4130_Units: How long did s/he have puffiness of the face?
A4131: Did s/he have general puffiness all over her/his body
A4132: During the illness that led to death, did (NAME)’s skin flake off in patches?
A4133: Did s/he have yellow discoloration of the eyes?
A4134_Units: For how long did s/he have yellow discoloration?
A4135: Did (NAME)’s hair change in color to a reddish or yellowish color?
A4136: Did s/he look pale (thinning/lack of blood) or have pale palms, eyes or nail bed?
A4137: Did s/he look pale (thinning/lack of blood) or have pale palms, eyes or nail bed?
A4138: Did s/he have any lumps or lesions in the mouth?
A4139: Did s/he have any lumps on the neck?
A4140: Did s/he have any lumps on the armpit?
A4144: Did s/he have any lumps on the groin?
A4145: Did s/he have stiffness of the whole body or was unable to open the mouth?
A4146: Was s/he in any way paralyzed?
A4147: Did s/he have paralysis of only one side of the body?
A4148: Which were the limbs or body parts paralyzed?
A4149: Did s/he have difficulty swallowing?
A4150_Units: For how long before death did s/he have difficulty swallowing?
A4151: Was the difficulty with swallowing with solids, liquids or both?
A4152: Did s/he have pain upon swallowing?
A4153: During the illness that led to death, did (NAME) have a whitish rash inside the mouth or on the tongue?
A4154: During the illness that led to death, did (NAME) bleed from anywhere?
A4155: Did s/he bleed from the nose, mouth or anus?
A4156: During the illness that led to death, did s/he have areas of the skin that turned black?
A4157: Did she have any swelling or lump in the breast?
A4158: Did she have any ulcers (pits) in the breast?
A4159: Did she ever have a period or menstruate?
A4160: When she had her period, did she have vaginal bleeding in between menstrual periods?
A4161: Was the bleeding excessive?
A4161_1: Was there excessive vaginal bleeding in the week prior to death?
A4162: Did her menstrual period stop naturally because of menopause or removal of the uterus?
A4163_1: Did she have vaginal bleeding after cessation of menstruation?
A4163: At the time of death was her period overdue?
A4164: For how many weeks had her period been overdue?
A4166: Did she have a sharp pain in her belly (abdomen) shortly before death?
A4167: Was she pregnant and not yet in labor at the time of death?
A4168_1: Did she die during labor or delivery, abortion or miscarriage?
A4168_3: Did she die within 24 hours after delivery, abortion or miscarriage?
A4168: Did she die within 6 weeks of delivery, abortion or miscarriage?
A4173_1: Did she give birth to a live baby (within 6 weeks of her death)?
A4173: Did she die less than 1 year after being pregnant, having an abortion or delivering a baby?
A4173_2: Did she give birth to a live baby (within 1 year of her death)?
A4178_1: For how many months was she pregnant?
A4178_2: Please confirm, when she died, she was NEITHER pregnant NOR had delivered, had an abortion or miscarried within 12 months of when she died--Is that right?
A4178: Did she die during or after a multiple pregnancy?
A4179: Was she breastfeeding the child in the days before death?
A4180: How many births, including stillbirths, did she/the mother have before this pregnancy?
A4181: Had she had any Caesarean section before this pregnancy?
A4182: During this pregnancy, did she suffer from high blood pressure?
A4183: Did she have foul smelling vaginal discharge during the pregnancy or after delivery?
A4184: During the last 3 months of the pregnancy, did she suffer from convulsions?
A4185: During the last 3 months of the pregnancy, did she suffer from blurred vision?
A4186: Did bleeding occur while she was pregnant?
A4186_1: Was there vaginal bleeding during the first 6 months of the pregnancy?
A4187: Was there vaginal bleeding during the last 3 months of the pregnancy but before labor started?
A4188: Did she have excessive bleeding during labor or delivery?
A4189: Did she have excessive bleeding after delivery?
A4190: Was the placenta completely delivered?
A4191: Did she deliver or try to deliver an abnormally positioned baby?
A4192: For how many hours was she in labor?
A4193: Did she attempt to terminate the pregnancy?
A4193_1: How did she do this?
A4194: Did she recently have a pregnancy that ended in an abortion (spontaneous or induced)?
A4195: Did she die during an abortion (spontaneous or induced)?
A4196: Did she die within 6 weeks of having an abortion (spontaneous or induced)?
A4197: Did she die more than 6 weeks but less than 1 year after having an abortion (spontaneous or induced)?
A4198_1: Did she have excessive bleeding (during / after) abortion?
A4198: Where did she (give birth / complete the miscarriage / have the abortion)?
A4200: Who (delivered the baby / completed the miscarriage / performed the abortion)?
A4202: Was the delivery normal vaginal, without forceps or vacuum?
A4203: Was the delivery vaginal, with forceps or vacuum?
A4204: Was the delivery a Caesarean section?
A4205: Was the baby born more than one month early?
A4205_1: Did she have an operation to remove her uterus shortly before death?
A4206: Did (NAME) suffer from any injury or accident that led to her/his death?
A4206_1: Was it a road traffic accident?
A4206_2: What was her/his role in the road traffic accident?
A4206_3: What was the counterpart that was hit during the road traffic accident?
A4206_4: Was (s)he injured in a non-road transport accident?
A4206_5: Was (s)he injured in a fall?
A4206_6: Was there any poisoning?
A4206_7: Did (s)he die of drowning?
A4206_8: Was (s)he injured by a bite or sting by venomous animal?
A4206_9: Was (s)he injured by an animal or insect (non-venomous)?
A4206_10: What was the animal/insect?
A4206_11: Was (s)he injured by burns/fire?
A4206_12: Was (s)he subject to violence (suicide, homicide, abuse)?
A4206_13: Was (s)he injured by a firearm?
A4206_14: Was (s)he stabbed, cut or pierced?
A4206_15: Was (s)he strangled?
A4206_16: Was (s)he injured by a blunt force?
A4206_17: Was (s)he injured by a force of nature?
A4206_18: Was it electrocution?
A4206_19: Did (s)he encounter any other injury?
A4206_20: Was the injury accidental?
A4206_21: Was the injury self-inflicted?
A4206_22: Was the injury intentionally inflicted by someone else?
A4207: How long did (NAME) survive after the injury?
A4251: Did (NAME) receive, or did you give or seek, any care or treatment for the fatal illness?

Please tell me everything that was done for (NAME)’s fatal illness inside the home and all the places outside the home (he / she) went or was taken for health care. Start with the first care or treatment (NAME) received and then, in order, tell me all the other care and treatments s/he received. Also tell me what symptoms were present when each action was taken.
Include any health care provider (NAME) was on route to but did not reach before dying.
For pregnancy-related deaths: Mark any provider where the woman had an abortion (spontaneous or induced) or delivered.

For all adults: If the illness lasted 3 months or more, ask about the first three actions taken at the start of the illness and the middle of the illness, and about the last three actions at the end of the illness. Circle ‘S’ (Start), ‘M’ (Middle) or ‘E’ (End) for each action.

(1) If the illness lasted 3 months or more, circle ‘S’ (Start), ‘M’ (Middle) or ‘E’ (End) for each action. (2) Check one other care or health care provider box for each action row. Check ‘Trained CHW, nurse or midwife’ only if the provider was seen outside a facility. (3) For pregnancy-related deaths only: Mark any provider where the woman aborted or delivered. (4) Mark the symptom(s) that were present when each action was taken.
A4253: Who decided to seek care for (NAME)’s illness from the (FIRST FORMAL PROVIDER)
A4254: Did you or (NAME) have any concerns or problems that kept him/her from going to a health provider during the illness?
A4255: What concerns or problems did you or (NAME) have?

A4256: You mentioned that (NAME) went to the (first) health provider, I mean the (FIRST HEALTH PROVIDER) with (SYMPTOM(S)). How long had (NAME) had (this / these) symptom(s) when it was decided to go to the (FIRST HEALTH PROVIDER)
A4274: Did (NAME) go to (all) the health provider(s) where s/he was referred?
A4275: Did you or (NAME) have any concerns or problems that kept him/her from going to a health provider where s/he was refrered?
A4276: What concerns or problems did you or (NAME) have?
A4277: Did you or (NAME) have to pay any money to travel to (the / any) health provider?
A4278: How did you or (NAME) arrange for the money to travel?
A4279: What transportation method was used to go to the health provider(s)?
A4280: Were there any problems during admission to the hospital or health facility?
A4281: Were there any problems with the way (s)he was treated (medical treatment, procedures, interpersonal attitudes, respect, dignity) in the hospital or health facility?
A4282: Were there any problems getting medications, or diagnostic tests in the hospital or health facility?
A4283: In the final days before death, did anyone use a telephone or cell phone to call for help?
A4284: How many days after (first noticing the illness/leaving the first/last health provider) did (NAME) die?
A4301: Did (NAME) receive any treatment for the illness that led to death?
A4302_1: Did (s)he receive oral rehydration salts?
A4302_2: Did (s)he receive intravenous fluids (drip) treatment?
A4302_3: Did (s)he receive a blood transfusion?
A4302_4: Did (s)he receive treatment/food through a tube passed through the nose?
A4302_5: Did (s)he receive injectable antibiotics?
A4302_6: Did (s)he receive antiretroviral therapy (ART)?
A4302_7: Did (s)he have an operation for the illness?
A4303: Did s/he have the operation within 1 month before death?
A4304: Do you have any health care records that belonged to the deceased?
A4305: Can I see the health records?
A4306_1check: Is the date of the most recent (last) visit available?
A4306_1: Record the date of the most recent (last) visit
A4306_2check: Is the date of the second most recent visit available?
A4306_2: Record the date of the second most recent visit
A4307: Record the date of the last note on the health records
A4308: Record the weight (in kilograms) written at the most recent (last) visit
A4309: Transcribe the last note on the health record
A4310_1: During the final illness, did a health professional diagnose dengue fever?
A4310_2: During the final illness, did a health professional diagnose measles?
A4310_3: During the final illness, did a health professional diagnose tuberculosis?
A4310_4: During the final illness, did a health professional diagnose diabetes?
A4310_5: During the final illness, did a health professional diagnose asthma?
A4310_6: During the final illness, did a health professional diagnose epilepsy?
A4310_7: Recently or during the final illness, did a health professional diagnose kidney disease?
A4310_8: Recently or during the final illness, did a health professional diagnose liver disease?
A4310_9: During the final illness, did a health professional ever diagnose heart disease?
A4310_10: During the final illness, did a health professional ever diagnose cancer?
A4310_11: During the final illness, did a health professional ever diagnose sickle cell disease?
A4311_1: During the final illness, did a health professional diagnose Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)?
A4311_2: During the final illness, did a health professional diagnose stroke?
A4311_3: During the final illness, did a health professional diagnose high blood pressure?
A4311_4: Did a health professional ever diagnose dementia?
A4311_5: During the final illness, did a health professional diagnose depression?
A4312: Did the deceased have a recent positive test by a health professional for malaria?
A4313: Did the deceased have a recent negative test by a health professional for malaria?
A4314: Did a health care worker tell you the cause of death?
A4315: What did the health worker say?
A4351: Was a death certificate issued?
A4352: Can I see the death certificate?
A4353: Record the immediate cause of death from the death certificate
A4354: Duration (1a)
A4355: Record the first underlying cause of death from the death certificate
A4356: Duration (1b)
A4357: Record the second underlying cause of death from the death certificate
A4358: Duration (1c)
A4363: Do you have a death registration certificate?
Yes, card seen
Yes, card not seen
No registration
A4364: Record the death registration number
A4401: Is this the house (where we are now) where (NAME) stayed during the his/her fatal illness?
A4402: Where did (NAME) stay at that time?
A4403: What is the address of the place where (NAME) stayed?
A4404: At the time of the illness events, how long had ((NAME) / (NAME)’s (RELATIVES) been living continuously in (this / that) community?
A4405: In an emergency, how long would it take to reach the nearest health facility from (this / that) location?
A4451: In the 12 months before (NAME) s death, did the people in the (village / neighborhood) work together on any of the following issues that affect the entire community or part of the community?
A4452: In the 12 months before (NAME)’s death, was (NAME) an active participant in any of the following types of groups in the community?
A4453: Did (NAME) turn to any of the following people or groups in the community for help during her/his illness?
A4454: Read: Now I have four last questions about the deceased and the spouse/partner of the deceased.
A4455: Was there any diagnosis by a health professional that the deceased had AIDS?
A4456: Did the deceased’s spouse/partner ever have a positive HIV test?
A4457: Was there any diagnosis by a health professional that the deceased’s spouse/partner had AIDS?

A4451_1: In the 12 months before \'s death, did the people in the (village / neighborhood) work together on Education/Schools issues that affect the entire community or part of the community?
A4451_2: In the 12 months before \'s death, did the people in the (village / neighborhood) work together on Health Services/Clinics issues that affect the entire community or part of the community?
A4451_3: In the 12 months before \'s death, did the people in the (village / neighborhood) work together on Paid job Opportunities issues that affect the entire community or part of the community?
A4451_4: In the 12 months before \'s death, did the people in the (village / neighbourhood) work together on Credit/Finance issues that affect the entire community or part of the community?
A4451_5: In the 12 months before \'s death, did the people in the (village / neighbourhood) work together on Roads issues that affect the entire community or part of the community?
A4451_6: In the 12 months before \'s death, did the people in the (village / neighbourhood) work together on Public Transportation issues that affect the entire community or part of the community?
A4451_7: In the 12 months before \'s death, did the people in the (village / neighbourhood) work together on Water Distribution issues that affect the entire community or part of the community?
A4451_8: In the 12 months before \'s death, did the people in the (village / neighbourhood) work together on Sanitation Services issues that affect the entire community or part of the community?
A4451_9: In the 12 months before \'s death, did the people in the (village / neighbourhood) work together on Agriculture issues that affect the entire community or part of the community?

A4451_13: In the 12 months before \'s death, did the people in the (village / neighbourhood) work together on any OTHER issues that affect the entire community or part of the community?
A4452_1: In the 12 months before ’s death, was an active participant in Vocational training group in the community?
A4452_2: In the 12 months before ’s death, was an active participant in Savings group or microcredit program groups in the community?
A4452_3: In the 12 months before ’s death, was an active participant in Community cooperative, such as an agricultural cooperative groups in the community?
A4452_4: In the 12 months before ’s death, was an active participant in Political groups in the community?
A4452_5: In the 12 months before ’s death, was an active participant in Religious group in the community?
A4452_6: In the 12 months before ’s death, was an active participant in Sports Club in the community?
A4452_7: In the 12 months before ’s death, was an active participant in Youth / Student Club in the community?
A4452_8: In the 12 months before ’s death, was an active participant in Women’s Group in the community?
A4452_9: In the 12 months before ’s death, was an active participant in any OTHER types of groups in the community?
A4453_1: Did turn to Religious people or groups in the community for help during her/his illness?
A4453_2: Did turn to Women’s people or groups in the community for help during her/his illness?
A4453_3: Did turn to Savings or Microcredit program people or groups in the community for help during her/his illness?

A4453_4: Did turn to Any other community group, such as a vocational training group, community cooperative, political group, sports club, youth or student group people or groups in the community for help during her/his illness?
A4453_5: Did turn to Community or Political Leader in the community for help during her/his illness?
A4453_6: Did turn to Religious Leader in the community for help during her/his illness?
A4453_7: Did turn to Any Family in the community for help during her/his illness?
A4453_8: Did turn to Neighbors in the community for help during her/his illness?
A4453_9: Did turn to Friends for help during her/his illness?
A4453_10: Did turn to Patron/Employer/Benefactor in the community for help during her/his illness?
A4453_11: Did turn to Police for help during her/his illness?
A4453_12: Did turn to Any OTHER people or groups in the community for help during her/his illness?

4471: Note: This is an optional question, to be asked or not as determined by the study site. Read: Thank you for answering the many questions that I’ve asked. Would you like to tell me about <NAME>’s illness in your own words? Also, is there anything else about her/his illness that I did not ask and you would like to tell me about? After the respondent(s) finishes, ask: Is there anything else? Write the respondent’s exact words. After s/he has finished, read this back and ask her to correct any errors in what you wrote.
4473: Interviewer: Use this space to write down your comments and observations about the interview.
Kilograms Kg & DK = 999
A4257: What was the name of the <FIRST HEALTH PROVIDER> where <NAME went?
Government hospital
Government health center
Government health post
Mobile Clinic
Trained CHW, nurse or midwife (outside a health facility)
Other public sector
Private hospital
Private doctor/clinic
Mobile Clinic
Trained CHW, nurse or midwife (outside a health facility)
Other private medical sector
A4258: For health care at a facility, ask: Did <NAME> reach the <FIRST HEALTH PROVIDER> before s/he died?
Yes, reached before died
No, died on route to this provider / before this provider reached the deceased
No, could not reach this provider, so returned home or took other action
One person/group identified
Two or more persons/groups identified
No person/group identified
Any other community group, such as a vocational training group, community cooperative, political group, sports club, youth or student group
Community or political leader
Religious leader
Family
Neighbors
Friends
Patron/employer/benefactor
Police
Chronic kidney disease
Dialysis
Fever
Heart attack
Heart problem
Jaundice
Liver failure
Malaria
Pneumonia
Renal (kidney) failure
Suicide
None of the above words were mentioned
C3001: Was the child part of a multiple birth?
C3002: Was the child the first, second, or later in the birth order?
C3003: Is the mother still alive?
C3004: Did the mother die before, during or after the delivery?
C3005_Units: How long after the delivery did the mother die?
C3006: Where was the deceased born?
C3008: Who (at the facility) delivered the baby?
C3009_1: At birth, was the baby of usual size?
C3009_2: At birth, was the baby smaller than usual, (weighing under 2.5 kg)?
C3009_3: At birth, was the baby very much smaller than usual, (weighing under 1 kg)?
C3009_4: At birth, was the baby larger than usual, (weighing over 4.5 kg)?
C3010: What was the weight of the deceased at birth?
C3011: Record the source of the birth weight information.
C3012: What was the first or given name(s) of the deceased?
C3013: Did s/he ever attend school?
C3015: What is the highest level of school she/he attended: primary, secondary, or higher?
C3016: What is the highest [GRADE/YEAR] she/he completed (at that level)?
C3017: Was s/he able to read and write?
C3018: What was her/his economic activity status in the year prior to death?
C3018_1: What was her/his occupation, that is, what kind of work did s/he mainly do?
C3019_u: How old was the child when the fatal illness started?
C3020: Before the illness that led to death, was (the baby / the child) growing normally?
C3021_Units: For how long was (s)he ill before death?
C3022: Did s/he die suddenly?
C3051: Was the baby born more than one month early?
C3052: How many months long was the pregnancy before birth?
C3053: Were there any complications in the late part of the pregnancy (defined as the last 3 months, before labour)?
C3053a: Were there any complications during labour or delivery?
C3054: Did the baby’s mother have foul smelling vaginal discharge during the pregnancy?
C3055: During the last 3 months of pregnancy, did the baby’s mother suffer from blurred vision?
C3056: During the last 3 months of pregnancy, but before labor started, did the mother have vaginal bleeding?
C3057: During the last 3 months of pregnancy, labor or delivery did the mother suffer from high blood pressure?
C3058: Did the high blood pressure start before or after labor began?
C3059: During the last 3 months of pregnancy, labor or delivery, did the mother suffer from convulsions?
C3060: Did the convulsions start before or after labor began?
C3061: During labor, did the baby’s mother suffer from fever?
C3062: How many hours did the labor and delivery take?
C3063: Did the baby’s bottom, feet, arm or hand come out of the vagina before its head?
C3064: Did (you / the mother) receive care from any person or health facility for (any of) the pregnancy symptom(s) that started before labor?
C3065: Where did (you / she) receive this care?
C3066: Did (you / she) ever receive any care or treatment for (any of) the labor or delivery symptom(s) including any care or treatment at home?
C3067: Where did (you / she) receive this care or treatment?
C3068: Now I would like to ask about the last health provider where (you / the mother) received care for the labor or delivery symptoms.
C3069: Did the LAST HEALTH PROVIDER refer (you / the mother) to another health provider or facility?
C3070: Was the baby delivered by the LAST HEALTH PROVIDER?
C3071: Were there any bruises or signs of injury on the baby’s body at birth?
C3072: Was any part of the baby physically abnormal at the time of delivery? (for example: body part too large or too small, additional growth on body)
C3073_1: Did the baby/child have a swelling or defect on the back at time of birth?
C3073_2: Did the baby/child have a very large head at time of birth?
C3073_3: Did the baby/child have a very small head at time of birth?
C3074: Did the baby breathe immediately after birth, even a little?
C3075: Did the baby cry immediately after birth, even if only a little bit?
C3076: How long after birth did the baby first cry?
C3077: For babies delivered preterm (C3051=1 or C3052 less then 9 months) in a health facility (C3006=3-10), ask: Was the baby put in an incubator after the birth?
C3078: After the birth, was the baby put directly on the bare skin of (your / the mother’s) chest?
C3079: How long after the birth was the baby put on the bare skin of (your / the mother’s) chest?
C3080: Before being placed on the bare skin of (your / the mother’s) chest, was the baby wrapped up?
C3081: For how many hours each day was the baby directly on the bare skin of (your / the mother’s) chest?
C3082: For how many days was the baby put directly on the bare skin of (your / the mother’s) chest?
C3083: How long after birth was the baby first bathed?
C3084: Was the baby able to suckle or bottle-feed within the first 24 hours after birth?
C3085: Did the baby ever suckle in a normal way?
C3086: Did the baby stop being able to suckle in a normal way?
C3087: How many days after birth did the baby stop suckling?
C3088: Was the baby able to open her/his mouth at the time s/he stopped suckling?
C3089: During the illness that led to death, did the baby become cold to touch?
C3090: At what age did the baby start feeling cold to touch?
C3091: Did the baby have convulsions in the first 24 hours of life?
C3092: Did the baby have convulsions starting more than 24 hours after birth?
C3093: Did the baby’s body become stiff, with the head arched backwards?
C3094: Did (NAME) have a bulging or raised fontanelle during the illness that led to death?
C3095: Did s/he have a sunken fontanelle during the illness that led to death?
C3096: During the illness that led to death, did the baby become lethargic, after a period of normal activity?
C3097: During the baby’s first month of life, did s/he become unresponsive or unconscious?
C3098: Did the baby become unresponsive or unconscious soon after birth, within less than 24 hours?
C3099: Did the baby become unresponsive or unconscious more than 24 hours after birth?
C3101: Before (her / his) fatal illness began, did (NAME) sleep under an insecticide treated bed net?
C3102: Where (do you / does the mother) cook?
C3103: When (you / the mother) cooked, was (NAME) usually beside or carried by (you / her)?
C3104: Was (NAME) ever breastfed?
C3105: How long after birth was the baby first put to the breast?
C3106: Was (NAME) being breastfed on the day before the fatal illness began?
C3107_1: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given Plain Water?
C3107_2: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given Fruit juice or juice drinks?
C3107_3: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given Clear Broth?
C3107_4: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given Milk (other than breast milk)?
C3107_5: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given Infant formula?
C3107_6: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given Any other liquids?
C3107_7: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given Yogurt?
C3107_8: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given Commercial baby food?
C3107_9: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given Bread, Rice, Noodles, Porridge, or other foods made from grains?
C3107_10: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given Pumpkin, carrots, squash or sweet potatoes that are yellow or orange inside?
C3107_11: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given White potatoes, white yams, manioc, cassava, or other foods made from roots?
C3107_12: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given Any dark green, leafy vegetables?
C3107_13: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given Ripe mangoes, papayas or (INSERT ANY OTHER LOCALLY AVAILABLE VITAMIN A-RICH FRUITS)?
C3107_14: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given Any other fruits or vegetables?
C3107_15: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given Liver, kidney, heart or other organ meats?
C3107_16: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given Any meat, such as beef, pork, lamb, goat, chicken or duck?
C3107_17: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given Eggs?
C3107_18: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given Fresh or dried fish or shellfish?
C3107_19: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given Any foods made from beans, peas, lentils or nuts?
C3107_20: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given Cheese or other food made from milk?
C3107_21: On the day before the illness began, was (NAME) being given Any other solid, semisolid or soft food?
C3108: Now I would like to ask about the child’s vaccinations. Do you have a card where (NAME)’s vaccinations are written down?
C3109_1: DPT1 Vaccination recorded on the card as received
C3109_2: DPT2 Vaccination recorded on the card as received
C3109_3: DPT3 Vaccination recorded on the card as received
C3109_4: PENTA1 Vaccination recorded on the card as received
C3109_5: PENTA2 Vaccination recorded on the card as received
C3109_6: PENTA3 Vaccination recorded on the card as received
C3109_7: PCV(P1) Vaccination recorded on the card as received
C3109_8: PCV(P2) Vaccination recorded on the card as received
C3109_9: PCV(P3) Vaccination recorded on the card as received
C3109_10: PCV(+1) Vaccination recorded on the card as received
C3109_11: Rotavirus1 (R1) Vaccination recorded on the card as received
C3109_12: Rotavirus2 (R2) Vaccination recorded on the card as received
C3109_13: Rotavirus3 (R3) Vaccination recorded on the card as received
C3109_14: MEASLES Vaccination recorded on the card as received
C3110: Did (NAME) receive any vaccinations that are not included on this card, including vaccinations received in a national immunization day campaign?
C3111: Did (NAME) ever receive any vaccinations to prevent her/him from getting diseases, including vaccinations received in a national immunization day campaign?
C3111_1: A DPT vaccination, that is, an injection in the thighs or buttocks, sometimes given at the same time as polio drops or a Hep B vaccination?
C3111_2: How many times was a DPT vaccination received?
C3111_3: A PENTA vaccination, that is, an injection in the thighs or buttocks instead of a Hep B or DPT vaccination, sometimes given at the same time as polio drops?
C3111_4: How many times was a PENTA vaccination received?
C3111_5: A Pneumococcal (PCV) vaccination, that is, an injection in the shoulder or thigh at the age of 6 weeks or older?
C3111_6: How many times was a PCV vaccination received?
C3111_7: A measles or MMR injection, that is, a shot in the arm at the age of 9 months or older, to prevent measles?
C3111_8: A rotavirus vaccination, that is, a liquid medication given by putting drops in the baby’s mouth, sometimes given around the same time as polio drops or a Hep B vaccination?
C3111_9: How many times was a PCV vaccination received?
C3112: (Before / In the six months before) the fatal illness, did (NAME) receive at least one dose of vitamin A?
C3121: During the illness that led to death, did (NAME) have a fever?
C3122: At what age did the fever start?
C3123_Units: How long did the fever last?
C3124: Did the fever continue until death?
C3125: How severe was the fever?
C3126: What was the pattern of the fever?
C3127: Did the child have night sweats?
C3128: During the illness, did the child have sunken eyes?
C3129: Did s/he drink a lot more water than usual?
C3130: During the illness that led to death, did (NAME) have more frequent loose or liquid stools than usual?
C3131: How many stools did (NAME) have on the day that loose liquid stools were most frequent?
C3132_Units: How long before death did the frequent loose or liquid stools start?
C3133: Did the frequent loose or liquid stools continue until death?
C3134: How many days before death did the loose or liquid stools stop?
C3135: At any time during the fatal illness was there visible blood in the loose or liquid stools?
C3136: Was there blood in the stools up until death?
C3137: During the illness that led to death, did the child vomit?
C3138: Did s/he vomit in the week preceding death?
C3139: Did s/he vomit blood?
C3140: Was the vomit black?
C3141: Did s/he have any belly (abdominal) problem?
C3142: Did s/he have any belly (abdominal) pain?
C3143: Was the belly (abdominal) pain severe?
C3144_Units: For how long did (s)he have belly (abdominal) pain?
C3145: Was the pain in the upper or lower abdomen?
C3146: Did s/he have a more than usually protruding abdomen?
C3147_Units: For how long before death did (s)he have a more than usually protruding belly (abdomen)?
C3148: How rapidly did s/he develop the protruding abdomen?
C3149: Did s/he have a mass in the abdomen?
C3150_Units: For how long did (s)he have a mass in the belly (abdomen)?
C3151: During the illness that led to death, did the child have a cough?
C3152_Units: For how long did s/he have a cough?
C3153: Was the cough productive, with sputum?
C3154: Was the cough very severe?
C3155: Did the child make a whooping sound when coughing?
C3156: Did the child vomit after s/he coughed?
C3157: Did s/he cough up blood?
C3158: During the illness that led to death, did (NAME) have difficulty breathing?
C3159_Units: For how long did the difficult breathing last?
C3160: Was the difficult breathing continuous or on and off?
C3161: During the illness that led to death, did (NAME) have fast breathing?
C3162: At what age did the fast breathing start?
C3163_Units: How long did the fast breathing last?
C3164: During the illness that led to death, did the child have breathlessness?
C3165_Units: How long did s/he have breathlessness?
C3166: During the illness that led to death, did you see the lower chest wall/ribs being pulled in as the child breathed?
C3167: During the illness that led to death, did her/his breathing sound like any of the following?
C3168: Stridor
C3169: Grunting
C3170: Wheezing
C3171: Did s/he have chest pain?
C3172: How many days before death did s/he have chest pain?
C3173: Did (NAME) have a severe headache?
C3174: Did (NAME) have a stiff neck during the illness that led to death?
C3175_Units: How long before death did s/he have a stiff neck?
C3176: Did (NAME) have a painful neck during the illness that led to death?
C3177_Units: How long before death did s/he have a stiff neck?
C3178: Was (NAME) unconscious during the illness that led to death?
C3179_Units: How long before death did unconsciousness start?
C3180: Did the unconsciousness start suddenly, quickly (at most within a single day)?
C3181: Did the unconsciousness continue until death?
C3182: During the illness that led to death, did (NAME) have convulsions?
C3183: Did s/he experience any generalized convulsions or fits during the illness that led to death?
C3184: For how many minutes did the convulsions last?
C3185: Did s/he become unconscious immediately after the convulsion?
C3186_1: Did the child have any urine problem?
C3186: During the fatal illness, did s/he ever pass blood in the urine?
C3187: Did s/he stop urinating?
C3188: During s/he go to urinate more often than usual?
C3189: Did she have sores or ulcers anywhere on the body?
C3190: Did the sores or ulcers have pus?
C3191: Did s/he have an ulcer (pit) on the foot?
C3192: Did the ulcer on the foot ooze pus?
C3193_Units: How long did the ulcer on the foot ooze pus?
C3194: During the month before s/he died, did (NAME) have a skin rash?
C3195: Where was the rash?
C3195A: Where did the rash start?
C3196: How many days did the rash last?
C3197: Did s/he have a measles rash (use local term)?
C3198: During the illness that led to death, did the child have an area(s) of skin with redness and swelling?
C3199: Did (NAME) have noticeable weight loss? [hint: limbs (legs, arms) become very thin]
C3199_1: Was s/he severely thin or wasted?
C3200: During the illness that led to death, did (NAME) have swollen legs or feet?
C3201_Units: How long did the swelling last?
C3202: Did s/he have both feet swollen?
C3203: Did s/he have puffiness of the face?
C3204_Units: How long did s/he have puffiness of the face?
C3205: Did s/he have general puffiness all over her/his body
C3206: During the illness that led to death, did (NAME)’s skin flake off in patches?
C3207: Did s/he have yellow discoloration of the eyes?
C3208_Units: For how long did s/he have the yellow discoloration?
C3209: Did (NAME)’s hair change in color to a reddish or yellowish color?
C3210: Did s/he look pale (thinning/lack of blood) or have pale palms, eyes or nail bed?
C3212: Did s/he have any lumps on the neck?
C3213: Did s/he have any lumps on the armpit?
C3214: Did s/he have any lumps on the groin?
C3215: Did s/he have stiffness of the whole body or was unable to open the mouth?
C3216: Was s/he in any way paralyzed?
C3217: Did s/he have paralysis of only one side of the body?
C3218: Which were the limbs or body parts paralyzed?
C3219: Did s/he have difficulty swallowing?
C3220_Units: For how long before death did s/he have difficulty swallowing?
C3221: Was the difficulty with swallowing with solids, liquids or both?
C3222: Did s/he have pain upon swallowing?
C3223: During the illness that led to death, did (NAME) have a whitish rash inside the mouth or on the tongue?
C3224: During the illness that led to death, did (NAME) bleed from anywhere?
C3225: Did s/he bleed from the nose, mouth or anus?
C3226: During the illness that led to death, did s/he have areas of the skin that turned black?
C3227: Did (NAME) suffer from any injury or accident that led to her/his death?
C3227_1: Was it a road traffic accident?
C3227_2: What was her/his role in the road traffic accident?
C3227_3: What was the counterpart that was hit during the road traffic accident?
C3227_4: Was (s)he injured in a non-road transport accident?
C3227_5: Was (s)he injured in a fall?
C3227_6: Was there any poisoning?
C3227_7: Did (s)he die of drowning?
C3227_8: Was (s)he injured by a bite or sting by venomous animal?
C3227_9: Was (s)he injured by an animal or insect (non-venomous)?
C3227_10: What was the animal/insect?
C3227_11: Was (s)he injured by burns/fire?
C3227_12: Was (s)he subject to violence (suicide, homicide, abuse)?
C3227_13: Was (s)he injured by a firearm?
C3227_14: Was (s)he stabbed, cut or pierced?
C3227_15: Was (s)he strangled?
C3227_16: Was (s)he injured by a blunt force?
C3227_17: Was (s)he injured by a force of nature?
C3227_18: Was it electrocution?
C3227_19: Did (s)he encounter any other injury?
C3227_20: Was the injury accidental?
C3227_21: Was the injury self-inflicted?
C3227_22: Was the injury intentionally inflicted by someone else?
C3228: How long did (NAME) survive after the injury?
C3252: Did (NAME) receive, or did you give or seek, any care or treatment for the fatal illness?

Please tell me everything that was done for (NAME)’s fatal illness inside the home and all the places outside the home (s/he) went or was taken for health care. Start with the first care or treatment (NAME) received and then, in order, tell me all the other care and treatments s/he received. Also tell me what symptoms were present when each action was taken.
Include any health care provider (NAME) was on route to but did not reach before dying

For Children 28 days – 11 years old: If the illness lasted 3 months or more, ask about the first three actions taken at the start of the illness and the middle of the illness, and about the last three actions at the end of the illness. Circle ‘S’ (Start), ‘M’ (Middle) or ‘E’ (End) for each action.

1-If the illness lasted 3 months or more, circle ‘S’ (Start), ‘M’ (Middle) or ‘E’ (End) for each action. 
2-Check one other care or health care provider box for each action row. Check ‘Trained CHW, nurse or midwife’ only if the provider was seen outside a facility. 
3-For 28 day-11 month old deaths only: If the illness began at the provider where the child was delivered, then mark that as Action 1 and check the ‘Illness began at provider’ box. 
4 Mark the symptom(s) that were present when each action was taken.
C3254: If any formal care given or sought, ask: Who decided to seek care for (NAME)’s illness from the (FIRST FORMAL PROVIDER)
C3255: If never taken to a health provider, ask: Did you have any concerns or problems that kept you from taking (NAME) to a health provider during the illness?
C3256: What concerns or problems did (you / you or (NAME)) have?

C3257: You mentioned that you took (NAME) to the (first) health provider, I mean the (FIRST HEALTH PROVIDER) with (SYMPTOM(S)>. How long had (NAME) had (this / these) symptom(s) when it was decided to go to the (FIRST HEALTH PROVIDER)
C3278: Did you take the child to (all) the health provider(s) where s/he was referred?
C3279: Did you have any concerns or problems that kept you from taking (NAME) to a health provider where s/he was referred?
C3280: What concerns or problems did you have?
C3281: Did you have to pay any money to travel to (the / any) health provider?
C3282: How did you arrange for the money to travel?
C3283: What transportation method was used to go to the health provider(s)?
C3284: Were there any problems during admission to the hospital or health facility?
C3285: Were there any problems with the way (s)he was treated (medical treatment, procedures, interpersonal attitudes, respect, dignity) in the hospital or health facility?
C3286: Were there any problems getting medications, or diagnostic tests in the hospital or health facility?
C3287: In the final days before death, did anyone use a telephone or cell phone to call for help?
C3288: How many days after (first noticing the illness / (LAST ACTION C3253) / leaving the first/last health provider) did (NAME) die?
C3301: Did (NAME) receive any treatment for the illness that led to death?
C3302_1: Did (s)he receive oral rehydration salts?
C3302_2: Did (s)he receive intravenous fluids (drip) treatment?
C3302_3: Did (s)he receive a blood transfusion?
C3302_4: Did (s)he receive treatment/food through a tube passed through the nose?
C3302_5: Did (s)he receive injectable antibiotics?
C3302_6: Did (s)he receive antiretroviral therapy (ART)?
C3302_7: Did (s)he have an operation for the illness?
C3303: Did s/he have the operation within 1 month before death?
C3304: Do you have any health care records that belonged to the deceased?
C3305: Can I see the health records?
C3306_1check: Is the date of the most recent (last) visit available?
C3306_1: Record the date of the most recent (last) visit
C3306_2check: Is the date of the second most recent visit available?
C3306_2: Record the date of the second most recent visit
C3307: Record the date of the last note on the health records
C3308: Record the weight (in kilograms) written at the most recent (last) visit
C3309: Transcribe the last note on the health record
C3310_1: During the final illness, did a health professional diagnose dengue fever?
C3310_2: During the final illness, did a health professional diagnose measles?
C3310_3: During the final illness, did a health professional diagnose tuberculosis?
C3310_4: During the final illness, did a health professional diagnose diabetes?
C3310_5: During the final illness, did a health professional diagnose asthma?
C3310_6: During the final illness, did a health professional diagnose epilepsy?
C3310_7: Recently or during the final illness, did a health professional diagnose kidney disease?
C3310_8: Recently or during the final illness, did a health professional diagnose liver disease?
C3310_9: During the final illness, did a health professional ever diagnose heart disease?
C3310_10: During the final illness, did a health professional ever diagnose cancer?
C3310_11: During the final illness, did a health professional ever diagnose sickle cell disease?
C3311: Did the deceased have a recent positive test by a health professional for malaria?
C3312: Did the deceased have a recent negative test by a health professional for malaria?
C3313: Did a health care worker tell you the cause of death?
C3314: What did the health worker say?
C3351: Was a death certificate issued?
C3352: Can I see the death certificate?
C3353: Record the immediate cause of death from the death certificate
C3354: Duration (1a)
C3355: Record the first underlying cause of death from the death certificate
C3356: Duration (1b)
C3357: Record the second underlying cause of death from the death certificate
C3358: Duration (1c)
C3363: Do you have a death registration certificate?
C3364: Record the death registration number
C3401: How old (is the child’s mother / was the child’s mother when she died)?
C3402: Did the child’s mother ever attend school?
C3403: What is the highest level of school s/he attended: primary, secondary, or higher?
C3404: What is the highest [GRADE/YEAR] she completed at that level?
C3405: At the time of the child’s death, (were you / was the child’s mother) married or living together with a man as if married?
C3406: How old (were you when you / was she when she) first married (or lived with a man)?
C3407: Did (your / the mother’s) (husband/partner) ever attend school?
C3408: What is the highest level of school s/he attended: primary, secondary, or higher?
C3409: What was the highest [GRADE/YEAR] he completed at that level?
C3410: Is this the house (where we are now) where you stayed during the child’s fatal illness?
C3411: Where did you) stay at that time?
C3412: What is the address of the place where you stayed?
C3413: At the time of the illness events, how long had you / your (RELATIVES) been living continuously in (this / that) community?
C3414: In an emergency, how long would it take to reach the nearest health facility from (this / that) location?
C3451: In the 12 months before (NAME) death, did the people in the (village / neighborhood) work together on any of the following issues that affect the entire community or part of the community?
C3451_1: Education / schools
C3451_2: Health services / clinics
C3451_3: Paid job opportunities
C3451_4: Credit / finance
C3451_5: Roads
C3451_6: Public transportation
C3451_7: Water distribution
C3451_8: Sanitation services
C3451_9: Agriculture
C3451_10: Justice/conflict resolution
C3451_11: Security/police services
C3451_12: Mosque / church / temple
C3451_c1: One or more issues identified
C3451_c2: No issue identified
C3452: In the 12 months before (NAME) death, were you an active participant in any of the following types of groups in the community?
C3452_1": Vocational training group
C3452_2": Savings group or microcredit program
C3452_3": Community cooperative, such as an agricultural cooperative
C3452_4": Political group
C3452_5": Religious group
C3452_6": Sports club
C3452_7": Youth/student club
C3452_8": Women’s group
C3452_C1: One group identified
C3452_C2: Two or more groups identified
C3452_C3: No groups identified
C3453: Did you turn to any of the following people or groups in the community for help during the child’s fatal illness?
C3453_1: Religious group
C3453_2: Women’s group
C3453_3: Savings group or microcredit program
C3453_4: Any other community group, such as a vocational training group, community cooperative, political group, sports club, youth or student group
C3453_5: Community or political leader
C3453_6: Religious leader
C3453_7: Family
C3453_8: Neighbors
C3453_9: Friends
C3453_10: Patron/employer/benefactor
C3453_11: Police

C3453_C2: Two or more persons/groups identified
C3453_C3: No person/group identified
C3454: Read: Now I have four last questions about the child and the child’s mother.
C3455: Was there any diagnosis by a health professional that the child had AIDS?
C3456: Did (you / the child’s biological mother) ever have a positive HIV test?
C3457: Was there any diagnosis by a health professional that (you / the child’s biological mother) had AIDS?

"Note: This is an optional question, to be asked or not as determined by the study site. Read: Thank you for answering the many questions that I’ve asked. Would you like to tell me about (NAME)’s illness in your own words? Also, is there anything else about her/his illness that I did not ask and you would like to tell me about? After the respondent(s) finishes, ask: Is there anything else? Write the respondent’s exact words. After s/he has finished, read this back and ask her to correct any errors in what you wrote."
